item.title: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero ‘After Story’ to feature six characters from other Nippon Ichi Software games
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/phantom-brave-the-lost-hero-after-story-to-feature-six-characters-from-other-nippon-ichi-software-games

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

Disgaea, La Pucelle: Tactics, and Rhapsody: A Musical Adventure representatives.

Six characters from Nippon Ichi Software‘s other franchises will appear the “After Story” of Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero, Nippon Ichi Software announced.

The “After Story” is unlocked by clearing the main story, and features Laharl, Vavlatorez, and Pirilika from the Disgaea series, Prier from La Pucelle: Tactics, Cornet Espoir from Rhapsody: A Musical Adventure, and Asagi.

Videos of each character as they appear in the “After Story” will be published via the game’s official website over the coming weeks.

Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero is due out for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch on January 30, 2025 worldwide, followed by PC via Steam in spring 2025.

View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.

Screenshots

  • ❮
  • ❯

item.title: Switch worldwide sales top 146.04 million, The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom tops 2.58 million
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/switch-worldwide-sales-top-146-04-million-the-legend-of-zelda-echoes-of-wisdom-tops-2-58-million

  • Switch

2.62 million Switch hardware sold during the three months ended September 30, 2024.

Nintendo Switch has sold 146.04 million units worldwide as of September 30, 2024, Nintendo announced in its latest earnings release.

A total of 2.62 million Switch hardware and 39.64 million software were sold during the three months ended September 30, 2024.

Nintendo also shared updated sales numbers for its first-party Switch titles.

The 10 best-selling first-party Switch titles are:

  1. Mario Kart 8 Deluxe – 64.27 million
  2. Animal Crossing: New Horizons – 46.45 million
  3. Super Smash Bros. Ultimate – 35.14 million
  4. The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild – 32.29 million
  5. Super Mario Odyssey – 28.50 million
  6. Pokemon Sword / Pokemon Shield – 26.44 million
  7. Pokemon Scarlet / Pokemon Violet – 25.69 million
  8. The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom – 21.04 million
  9. Super Mario Party – 20.98 million
  10. New Super Mario Bros. U Deluxe – 17.77 million

Newly announced additional first-party sales numbers include:

  • Nintendo Switch Sports – 14.37 million
  • The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom – 2.58 million (New)
  • Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door (2024) – 1.94 million
  • Luigi’s Mansion 2 HD – 1.57 million

More than 1,306.10 million Switch games have been sold worldwide.
